title: A Picture of a Thousand Words
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Absinthe Junk

Here we are, the most Mandrake has spoken in a single go. So, the fun part for you guys is to see if you need a translation tablet, or if you can understand what she's saying.

Any guesses?

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: well WE can, we saw it happening, but if I wasn't there.....Yeah image overload.

replies.author: TC*Guest*
replies.text: Agree with Adamas, there.  Understood it because I saw it happen. XD

replies.author: Zixinus*Guest*
replies.text:
Well it's easy because we know what Mandrake is talking about!

You should give us an example sometime when we don't!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I love the eyes on the Mandrake image right after the Doc shot her up.And she's so cuuuttte!

replies.author: Pseudo*Guest*
replies.text: It all seems clear in hindsight. The 'chasing' icon with the stick figures is kinda cheating, but I don't see and alternative. Abstractions are tough with pictograms. How do her wings work with her outfit? Dosen't she need backless fashion?

replies.author: David*Guest*
replies.text: I like the inset "Uh..." look in the third panel. I'd hate to see her prepare and give a speech.
